name: Solvere
description:
This is part of a Group Student Project in Digipen. Play as an aspiring Alchemist and make use of your array of potions and mixtures to conquer the land, obstacles and any danger that might lurk ahead. All these in order to find the needed ingredients to save your sick mother.

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space bar

Select Potion - 1,2,3,4,5 (Q for previous) (Mouse wheel)

Throw Selected Potion - Left Click

Options/Pause - Escape

The Mac version might have graphic and layout issues, very sorry for the bad build.
